title: Should You Watch Bluey? - The Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 313)
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. 

Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames (edited) 

Greg makes Tim a Bluey fan, we gush about X-Men 97 and Deadpool, and question how far Nick and Greg can go.
